text: I'm systematically murdering the bloodline of a judge that used his power to sentence innocent women to death. And in the process, I'm dismantling an extremist neopolitical movement. But do tell me about how important your soapbox is.

And in the process, I'm dismantling an extremist neopolitical movement.
